movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an extraordinary amount of luck.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a soap salesman form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from subjugating Earth.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: The Matrix updated
movies.description: A hacker learns the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
